body_html: I can reproduce the issue when compiling the pip package bazel build -c opt --config=cuda //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package. Sometimes it even succeeds (after trying multiple times) but then bazel-bin/tensorflow/tools/pip_package/build_pip_package /tmp/tensorflow_pkg fails with error: can't copy 'tensorflow/python/training/gen_training_ops.py': doesn't exist or not a regular file
body_text: I can reproduce the issue when compiling the pip package bazel build -c opt --config=cuda //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package. Sometimes it even succeeds (after trying multiple times) but then bazel-bin/tensorflow/tools/pip_package/build_pip_package /tmp/tensorflow_pkg fails with error: can't copy 'tensorflow/python/training/gen_training_ops.py': doesn't exist or not a regular file
body: I can reproduce the issue when compiling the pip package `bazel build -c opt --config=cuda //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package`. Sometimes it even succeeds (after trying multiple times) but then `bazel-bin/tensorflow/tools/pip_package/build_pip_package /tmp/tensorflow_pkg` fails with `error: can't copy 'tensorflow/python/training/gen_training_ops.py': doesn't exist or not a regular file`
